description:
Sabo returns to Kamabakka Queendom and starts recounting what happened at the Holy Land Mary Geoise. A month ago, during the Reverie, he and the captains of the Revolutionary Army raided the Land of Gods and Sabo witnessed Bartholomew Kuma being the Celestial Dragons’ slave.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le retour de Sabo. La terrible vérité enfin révélée !
Sabo Returns - The Shocking Truth to Be Told!
Sabo no Kikan: Katarareru Shougeki no Shinjitsu!
Sabos Rückkehr – Die schockierende Wahrheit kommt ans Licht!
عودة سابو! الحقيقة المروّعة الّتي يجب أن تُقال!
サボの帰還 語られる衝撃の真実!
